programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The search for an abducted woman and her young daughter leads Lt. Benson to cross paths with an old friend; Stone must make a tough decision on behalf of his sister.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Rollins races to rescue a girl being held captive by her father.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Fin investigates a man's claim that his sister was gang raped.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: An Alzheimer's patient claims she was raped, but her illness casts doubt on the case; Fin's sergeant orders come in.

programme.title: The Rainmaker
programme.desc: As Rudy and Deck search for a missing nurse, their investigation suggests a dark conspiracy at play.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A young woman takes a man hostage at gunpoint; Benson makes an attempt to defuse the situation; the team discovers the shocking motive behind the abduction.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson's suspicions about a kidnapping victim uncover a dangerous criminal network prepared to silence anyone who gets in its way.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The detectives interrogate the CEO of a recording company and his protégé for their involvement in an assault on a transgender student.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Fin crosses international borders to catch a fugitive rapist; a political tug-of-war derails Barba's legal case; shocking allegations against Benson lead to the return of an old friend.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Rollins and Carisi suspect a woman's bizarre rape story is fabricated; Benson goes on the offensive when her personal life is scrutinized.

The 118 fights an apartment building blaze and attempts a daring rescue of a blind woman trapped inside; Athena discovers a potentially sinister crime; Hen performs a risky medical procedure after an accident at a televised cooking show.

The 118 races to rescue a little girl in a runaway hot air balloon and help with a city power outage caused by a hijacked tree-trimmer truck; Athena's investigation into the serial rapist case puts her life in jeopardy.
The 118 rush to save lives in the aftermath of a massive train derailment.

The 118 responds to calls dealing with parents and their children, including a disastrous birthday party thrown by a mommy blogger; Athena and Michael talk to May about her past suicide attempt; Chimney and Maddie adjust to life with their newborn.

The members of the 118 rush to the site of a hit-and-run that leaves a familiar face in critical condition; with Buck's help, Athena investigates the case of a missing woman; Josh recalls an emergency in 2006 that led him to become a first responder.
When a famous mystery writer dies, Athena, Bobby and the 118 respond to the chaos caused by a citywide manhunt for buried treasure the author left behind.

The members of the 118 make calls to save a bridezilla at a disastrous wedding; Hen plays medical detective when her mother falls ill; Eddie and Christopher receive a visit from Carla; Athena uncovers a secret Bobby has been hiding.
Athena and the 118 are on high alert when a sniper is targeting members of the LAFD; Maddie makes a life decision.

A series of ransomware threats leads to emergencies for the 118, including a helicopter crash at a hospital and an air traffic control tower system failure; the case of the realtor serial rapist goes to trial.

programme.title: Olympus Has Fallen
programme.desc: Disgraced Secret Service agent Mike Banning finds himself trapped inside the White House in the wake of a terrorist attack and works with national security to rescue the President from his kidnappers.

programme.title: The Town
programme.desc: A Boston bank robber (Ben Affleck) looks for a way out of his criminal lifestyle after beginning a passionate romance with the woman (Rebecca Hall) that his gang briefly took hostage.

programme.title: Live: WWE Friday Night SmackDown
programme.desc: The Superstars of World Wrestling Entertainment display their skills and athleticism in weekly episodic programming, as scores are settled and enduring rivalries play out in the ring.

programme.title: The Rainmaker
programme.desc: When Sarah reveals a detail about the case, Rudy must choose between his client and girlfriend.

programme.title: The Rainmaker
programme.desc: Young attorney Rudy Baylor, alongside Bruiser Stone and Deck Shifflet, battles a powerful law firm led by Leo F. Drummond and his girlfriend, Sarah Plankmore, unearthing a dark conspiracy that shows how far his opponents are willing to go to win.

programme.title: London Has Fallen
programme.desc: In London for the Prime Minister's funeral, Mike Banning is caught up in a plot to assassinate all the attending world leaders.

programme.title: The Rainmaker
programme.desc: When Sarah reveals a detail about the case, Rudy must choose between his client and girlfriend.

programme.title: Dateline
programme.desc: Mischele Lewis' new boyfriend seems almost too good to be true, then she discovers he is a con man harboring dark secrets and embarks on a dangerous mission to expose him.

programme.title: Dateline
programme.desc: After a tech millionaire's neighbor is found murdered, he goes on the run and plays a high-stakes game of hide-and-seek with the authorities and the press.

programme.title: Dateline
programme.desc: A man who was recently acquitted of the murder of his ex-girlfriend's 12-year-old son tells his story; interview with the victim's mother and key players in the case.

programme.title: Thor: Love and Thunder
programme.desc: God of Thunder teams up with King Valkyrie, Korg and ex-girlfriend-turned-Mighty-Thor Jane Foster to take on a galactic killer known as Gorr the God Butcher.

programme.desc: Black Panther's mettle as king gets tested when an old enemy draws him into a conflict that puts his nation and the world at risk. The king must soon rally his allies and release his full power to defeat his foes and secure the safety of his people.

programme.title: MotoGP Highlights
programme.desc: MotoGP highlights from the 2025 Grand Prix of Italy at Mugello Circuit, where Ducati's Francesco Bagnaia was seeking a fourth consecutive win at his home race.

programme.title: MotoGP Highlights
programme.desc: Highlights from the 2025 MotoGP Grand Prix of Netherlands at TT Circuit Assen, as six-time world champion Marc Marquez looked to take another step towards the title.

programme.title: MotoGP Highlights
programme.desc: Highlights from the 2025 MotoGP Grand Prix of Germany at the iconic Sachsenring. This eventful race saw multiple riders crash out.

programme.title: MotoGP Highlights
programme.desc: Highlights from the 2025 MotoGP Grand Prix of Czechia at Automotodrom Brno. Could pole-sitter Pecco Bagnaia end Marc Marquez's spell of dominance?

programme.title: MotoGP Highlights
programme.desc: Highlights from the 2025 MotoGP Grand Prix of Austria, as standings leader Marc Marquez finally ended his wait for a win at Red Bull Ring in Spielberg.

programme.title: UEFA Champions League: Greatest Nights
programme.desc: A nostalgic reflection on some of Arsenal's most unforgettable matches in the Champions League including interviews with former stars and managers who made history for the club.

programme.title: UEFA Champions League Classics
programme.desc: A look back at the second leg of the 2003/04 UEFA Champions League quarter-final between Arsenal and Chelsea at Highbury. The visitors had not beaten the Gunners in five years.

programme.title: UEFA Champions League Classics
programme.desc: We revisit a thrilling night at Anfield as Liverpool faced Arsenal in the quarter-final second leg of the 2007/08 UEFA Champions League. The first leg at the Emirates finished 1-1.

programme.desc: All the latest action from Major League Baseball wrapped up, featuring the league's top hitters and pitchers.

programme.desc: We review the biggest stories and best action from the 2025 Men's and Women's Tour de l'Avenir.

programme.desc: Action from the longest stage of the 2025 La Vuelta, as the riders must conquer a 202km mountain route with an elevation gain of 4,000m.
